description: These shorts combine a hiking-inspired silhouette with stretch chino fabric for a rugged look that's purely Polo.
fitting_details: Stretch Classic Fit: sits at the waist. Eased through the leg.
All Big sizes have an 8½" inseam. Size Big 2X has 44" waist that expands to 56" and an 11¾" rise.
All Tall sizes have a 9½" inseam. Size Tall 2L has 44" waist that expands to 56" and an 11¾" rise.
Elastic waistband. Webbed belt with a buckled closure.
Two front angled pockets. Two back welt pockets.
"Polo" label at the back right pocket.
Signature Pony at the belt tip.
